title: Business & Finance
text:
Several Chinese firms that face the prospect of being booted off U.S.stock exchanges have come up with a way to keep their U.S. listings, while Beijing seeks to resolve an audit rift with Washington.

---

Brainard said the Fed is strongly committed to taking steps that will lower inflation this year, including by approving significant reductions in its asset portfolio at its policy meeting next month.

---

U.S. stock indexes fell, with the S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow losing 1.3%, 2.3% and 0.8%, respectively.

---

Amazon is stepping up plans for its proposed fleet of internet satellites that would compete with a service operated by SpaceX .

---

JetBlue is vying to acquire Spirit Airlines for roughly $3.6 billion, challenging Frontier in its efforts to buy the ultra-low-cost carrier.

---

Boeing factory problems disrupted production of one of its new Air Force One planes earlier this year, people familiar with the matter said.

---

WarnerMedia 's top two executives announced their exits, moves that come ahead of the expected closing of AT&T and Discovery's deal to combine their media assets.

---

GM and Honda plan to jointly develop a line of affordable electric vehicles, deepening strategic ties.
